title: Best of 2018: Remembering Bush 41 and His Legacy
description:
Originally aired 12/5/2018
In a moving ceremony, the nation said goodbye to former President George H.W. Bush. He was remembered as a public servant, a good friend and a loving husband and father. David Meyers speaks with Bloomberg Washington Bureau Chief Craig Gordon on how the solemn day's events also reminded the country of  a more civil time in U.S. politics. 
FOLLOW UP
 Bloomberg's latest report: George W. Bush Eulogizes ‘Best Father’ at Solemn State Funeral
You can follow Craig at: @dcraiggordon
----
 TicToc is a daily news podcast hosted by David Meyers (@davidfmeyers), produced at Bloomberg Worldwide HQ in New York City. You can follow up with us and watch our reporting @tictoc. If you like it, be sure to rate us on iTunes, and tell your friends!
